text:
Think about your closet from chapter 1. You've sorted your clothes into "must keep" and "probably should get rid of" piles. But are you actually ready to toss the "probably should get rid of" stuff? 

Just figuring out what doesn’t work isn’t enough. You need to take action. It’s time to let go of the things that don’t matter so you can focus on what really does. ✨

**PAGE SUMMARY:** The key idea is that one must not only identify but also actively eliminate non-essential activities to focus on what truly matters.
